Review.Titre: If I only could give zero
Review.Contenu: If I only could give zero! Popl in Copenhagen is the worst burger experience ever! The burger was dry roasted, their own beer was tasteless, very small and very expensive! The chilli salsa had absolutely no taste of Chilli and on top I had to read the meny on my phone! Beieng 60+ I have no chance of reading a poor layoutet and low info meny on such a small screen. Whats wrong with a meny on paper? Further no one spoke Danish in Copenhagen?

Review.Titre: I bought it last year and got…
Review.Contenu: I bought it last year and got discouraged. It wasn't connecting my information and then they sent 2 different cards one was supposed to scan and input info. When I followed instructions it still did not work. Called today and she started acting like she couldn't hear me then hung up the phone. I called back no answer. So these are lies that they are saying good customer service because it's not. As I am leaving the review it has been 10 minutes and still no return phone call. But I guess when you spend 7.99 what can you expect? The phone number is based out of El Sobrante, CA which is only a 20-minute drive for me so it shouldn't be a situation in communication. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone who has a good business. And is just trying to use digital cards to deviate from paper. if you could leave no stars I would. Its garbage

Foreign company, not English speaking or even competent. If you order a custom card, Popl is not who to use! They gave me the run around from support, email, WhatsApp, Instagram chat, back to their support! All I’ve been attempting to do is provide the files their Hi-Res department gave me, back to their Print department for my custom print order. Which seems impossible after a week of attempting. AVOID them to save yourself the headaches.

Disappointed. Purchased this a month  ahead of a conference and they never fulfilled the order. It wasn’t until I emailed customer service asking for an update did they say the item would ship 3 days later and then it would take 2-6 business days to arrive. I had to cancel the order as it would arrive a week after the conference and 5 weeks after the initial order. Their online ordering said it would take 3-4 weeks.

Review.Titre: They don’t take returns. Product is not functional.
Review.Contenu: Ordered a custom metal card after watching a few reviews.This product has incredibly misleading advertising. They make it seem like you just tap the card to the phone like making an Apple Wallet payment at the store.Instead you have to wave it around like a wand across the back of the phone and it works properly maybe half the time. May not seem like a big deal, but if you’ve made a good impression and want to share your information the last thing you want to do is fumble around with your business card.They offer no refunds or returns per their website itself which I had no thought to look up before ordering because I’ve never seen that from a company before. Horrible company, horrible advertising, horrible product.

Review.Titre: They just don't care about their customers.
Review.Contenu: The product is good but the customer support is horrible. I'm switching to a competitor because the support was horrible. I spent two hours on their online chat because the first person, Kath, ignored me and the second person kept ignoring me until they saw I was frustrated. Then magically they had time to reply. At that point the damage was done.

Review.Titre: They try to sell the people who download my info
Review.Contenu: Waited over one month for the card.  The tap works approximately 1/2 the time, so I need to use the QR code which I didn’t need the $80 metal card to accomplish.  Most disturbingly, every time someone downloads my contact, they are then prompted / asked if they want to buy a Popl.  I have received over 25 emails from Popl over the past month trying to sell me ….wait for it…more Popl.  Maybe the most disappointing purchase I have made in the past decade.

Review.Titre: I’m trapped. Can’t stop their emails for love nor money!
Review.Contenu: Honestly… I have tried to unsubscribe from this company’s emails a dozen times using the ‘unsubscribe’ option at the end of their email, which clearly does nothing, I have emailed back and forth, been told numerous times that they’ll sort it. More spam emails today! What a joke of a company. I’ll be reporting them. Do not subscribe to them, you’ll never get rid.

Review.Titre: Used to love Popl now I hate it
Review.Contenu: Used to love Popl now I hate it. I can never get anybody to help me. After a week of a pair of custom cards ordered no kind of email confirmation of my order so I decided to cancel the order. After cancelling it’s been about a month and they still haven’t refunded what was never made or shipped. But I guess that’s what happens when a couple of 20 year olds start a company. After a while they really don’t GAF they’ll just take money and send spam emails and want you to buy more and more…I’ve since contacted customer service they cancelled the order and didn’t refund it I decided to take it into my own hands. Better Business Bureau will be notified to get all of the money back that I’ve spent on two different purchases I’ve already cancelled my pro+ subscription and will be notifying the Federal Trade Commission and California’s Attorney General of Popl’s Shady business Practices. And thank God this happened before I signed up for Popl Teams.

Review.Titre: Popl’s links have appeared to ask for…
Review.Contenu: Popl’s links have appeared to ask for people’s card information. I am very disappointed because the people I attempt to show off Popl wont trust the technology.

Review.Titre: If I could put zero I would
Review.Contenu: If I could put zero I would. This has been the worse experience I have ever dealt with while dealing with a company in the United States. First the sales person made a meeting while she was boarding a plan. So on the zoom call she basically said just buy it and you can figure it out, but would not answer my questions. I was going to get it anyway but the red flags started going up. Then the CRO Jermey said he would give me 3 free metal cards to make up for it. Great I thought, so while dealing with Operations Assistant Barbie- I stated multiple times “I don’t want the popl logo on my stuff, only my logo.” And I would pay a upgrade for it. But this was to confusing so they charged me for 3 new cards at full price, after I said I want to upgrade the free ones over 10 different email replies. Don’t buy - great product terrible service not a professional company. I got 4 emails back apologizing but never offering to fix the issue.

Review.Titre: Printed my custom logo incorrectly and…
Review.Contenu: Printed my custom logo incorrectly and still have not received a replacement. Popl unused because 1/3 of my logo is missing. Impossible for me to write a good review at the current moment. Been almost a month since original order

First review on Trustpilot, I'm that motivated by terrible customer service. They require you to buy expensive devices, BUT DO NOT ACCEPT ANY RETURNS. Your user account and their product ordering platform are also completely separate and do not integrate.

Review.Titre: I would definitely not use this company…
Review.Contenu: I would definitely not use this company again. I paid a high price for this NFC card and it took forever to receive.  Then when I tried to create the digital card I get all these hidden costs to add an extra phone number and so on.  Not worth the money when other companies are in this space for the same type of service. Now their card sits in my door and now I use blinq which I just fell into and it was free for more than this company. Wish I would have found them before o wasted money on this card.

Review.Titre: Almost 5 months and 3 orders and still they can't get it right!!!
Review.Contenu: I ordered 30 popls in April and separately emailed them to ask them to expedite them if possible. It was not. 5 week later I asked where my oder was and it had not even been shipped. Apparently a processing issue. So I reordered them and after another 7 weeks they were stuck at customs. I filled out all the information customs requested but Popl did not so they got returned. I then placed another order to a different country to stop the customs problem and instead of the 40 I now ordered they sent me 8!! customer service has been terrible. They said they would give me 20% discount for the inconvenience but never recieved it. Still waiting for a refund on the orders that never arrived. Its such a shame to have a good product and then the customer service totally lets the company down.

Ordered from Popl and a popular competitor. Competitor Sent an email 3 days after order placed stating it had been shipped. Received and product worked great. Followed up with popl 6 days after order placed for status. 24 hours later, received message that they would email tracking info when order was shipped. 3 days later, no email so I ask again for status or a refund. They then sent a message saying the product was delivered that day and to check mail, BUT the tracking info had no address! It only included my zip code. Reached out again and no response. Use another company. I have to get my credit card company to reverse charge. Big hassle. Meanwhile I've been using the competitors product for over a week and still have nothing from Popl.Update...received refund of order finally.
These are not professional and come with the badges scratched up. The second one as a replacement came scratched up as well. Definitely not worth it if your in a professional role.

Friend got me a card for giggles. We fooled around with it but the whole idea was pretty silly and the card was super useless. Threw away the card and then they charged me $77 for their yearly subscription 2 weeks later and wouldn’t refund me. Just stick to swapping socials the normal way.

I recently purchased 32 Popl’s for my business. After meeting with the Popl team I realized they were not going to work for us for the purpose we needed them and we did not have the budget to spend over $300 per month for their teams platform. I emailed asking about a return/refund for the product and have heard nothing from them. I have tried emailing multiple times with no reply. You would think a business would at least have the common decency to reply even if the answer is no or they would at minimum try to work something out. I think their customer service is below par and would never recommend or use their product. I also have been unable to remove their pro product from my app/account and they have no information on their site regarding this. They don’t respond to email so I guess they just try to get your money and than ghost you. I plan to contact BBB and as many other review sites as I can. You are better off creating a contact card in your contacts and texting it to anyone who needs your information.UPDATE: they replied to this review but can’t reply to email. I have checked my junk/spam, everywhere. No reply. This is a scam and terrible customer service. Be sure that I will be spreading this info everywhere I can do no one else has to go thru this.

Review.Titre: An flaw in the ordering system
Review.Contenu: I already have a black rope band but later had an opportunity to order a white rope band.  When i ordered it using a 35% discount, Somehow, it reverted to the color black.  When I received it, I quickly responded back with an email stating the issue.  I finally got a response that I could not exchange the color.  Instead, they gave me anothrr 35% off which THATS the only reason I ordered the second band the first time.  I already had a black.  I wanted a white as well.  I really wanted the white band.  I don't want to spend MORE money on something the went wrong on the last order. What it it reverts to black AGAIN.  I'm not happy with the response that was given.  I'm an honest customer who was subject to a flaw in the ordering system.

Review.Titre: They sent me the wrong color card
Review.Contenu: They sent me the wrong color card, they charge for almost everything besides the very basics. The cards are 4.99, but if you want the upgraded buttons added to your card…you have to pay monthly 7.99. 7.99x12= 95.88. Not worth it. I’d recommend dot.cards!They only charge $20 for a card and no subscription needed whatsoever. Can completely customize your cards. Just speaking as someone who has had both. The really cool thing about popl is that they have a QR code that can be added to your wallets app in Apple.
2 of the cards were printed incorrectly. I reached out to see if it could be fixed, but I'm still waiting.

I ordered the Gold Metal Card, one for myself and one for a gift, as well as the custom badge. I received one Gold Card , which I set up for myself. Upon receiving it I was impressed with the packaging, opening it was another story - the card had fingerprints on it and light swirl marks. It looked used. For a company that sells a product based on image and self promotion. They need to up their game on how they send out their product to it's customers.I have yet to receive any update on the second Gold Card, so much for their email updates. The custom badge, I have not received any updates on that order. I did use the Chat option and connected with one of their C/S agents - Kath, who asked if she could follow up with an email. That was a week ago and still no word.Long story short, great concept but their customer service is lacking, and their follow through is even worse. Coupled with the fact that the Gold Card is hit or miss when using it.....Waiting to see if the custom badge works better. That's if I ever receive it!!

Review.Titre: broke in 2 days - Popl separated from base sticker
Review.Contenu: Update - Custom Popl's phyiscally broke in 2 days of use. The custom logo separated from the base sticker and fell off the phone. Good product. Ordered a few tagsfor my wife's work team and just ordered a bunch of cards for my sales team.I like them but I wish the size of the tag was much smaller. We make NFC devices with 5yr battery life, so I know they can be smaller. Let's see how the cards look, havent received them yet. Definitely wish the custom cards actually showed a delivery date so I knew before placing the order if I'll get them in time. This should be implemented especially if Popl is targeting business clients as most of them need it for trade shows or event giveaways etc.

Review.Titre: Took way too long to get the card (5+…
Review.Contenu: Took way too long to get the card (5+ weeks). I understand it was personalized, and those take 1-3 weeks to ship, but that is NOT explained anywhere during the ordering process. Also, that would mean it took 2+ weeks to ship a small plastic card across the country? Doesn't add up. When I got the card, it didn't work. The email support takes a day to respond to every request, and they're asking me questions every time about the process, that I've already tried - so it's been 6 weeks, and I still don't have a working product. Bad purchase.

I ordered a custom popl dot for the back of my phone as well as 4 custom business cards. The dot was delivered in 4-5 business days (as stated on website) and it looked great, but the business cards have yet to be delivered. IT HAS BEEN OVER A MONTH SINCE I PURCHASED MY ORDER (April 26, 2022). I contacted customer service and was told the cards would be delivered over a week ago…This has been very disappointing. I will not order from this company again nor would recommend their products or services to anyone.

Great idea- not so great operationally.

I bought the metal card. The card is nice, and has held up well (though so far, it’s only been a month). It was fairly easy to link to a digital card. I may choose to get additional equipment for the different cards at a later date. As a part time graphic designer/art teacher, I have to say - packaging was very well thought out, and nicely executed. One small thing working against Popl (probably all of these digital card companies) is that so far, few people  locally (SE Michigan) seem familiar with it. I’m still fairly new to it myself (been to two networking events so far) - a series of videos on how to scan the card, best orientation of the phones, things to watch out for, etc would be helpful… many people (so far) seem leery about the tech. And if we try it, they end up just giving up after a few quick tries, and asking for the traditional cards.Again, this is not so much a problem with the company, but just that learning to use it is so new to everyone… There’s a little bit of a learning curve.  Back to the good - I’m currently using Popl Pro. The extra features work well. I do a few things that are vastly different from each other (art consulting, graphic design vs several of the performing arts), so being able to create multiple cards for each facet is a nice feature (for me). The digital “cards” themselves were easy to set up, and the design makes it fairly intuitive. The customization (colors, pictures, the QR code personalization) is nice, it’s a good design. I like being able to link extra apps - like Square, Venmo, etc (in case someone would like to pay / tip digitally). And the extra links are a great idea - Not just social media links, but features like embedding video or linking with Calendly makes this a plus over traditional cards. That, and the easy editing features. I can rebrand or change my number in a few minutes, and I don’t need to toss/recycle hundreds of cards or pay another few hundred dollars to reprint over a small change. Over all, so far, so good!

Opposed to the two other digital cards I've tried, Popl has multiple more options within it's platform for me to quickly network efficiently. I'm a Real Estate Broker and it's very important that I pass my info along as fast as possible to as many people as possible. The bracelet and card have saved me hundreds of dollars on business cards but more importantly, tons of time. Now that I'm a Brand Ambassador, I'm getting paid to help others do the same.If you have any questions, link with me:poplme .co/hash/snPgAGaT/1/s-Druski

I think this is such a great concept, especially for small businesses. I personally purchased my Popls for in-person markets to alleviate waste from business cards. Unfortunately, people usually prefer to scan my PoplXL rather than tap. One of the frustrating things, right out of the package was my phone is not NFC compatible which prevented me from activating my phone-back Popl. If the card that it comes on had a QR code, I would have been able to activate the small Popl no problem. I was instructed to find a friends phone to activate it from, which is far from convenient. I will definitely continue to use and recommend this product to my fellow business owners, but I'm looking forward to some improvements. Pros: Super convenient once it's set up. Great concept and easy to add links to the account. Personalization is available to match your branding. Responsive customer service. Cons: not compatible on all phones, which really doesn't happen often but QR codes are helpful {but also free...} The offering of a second "business or personal" side to the app is awesome but charging the Pro fee is a little frustrating especially since neither side is truly "free". Additional features aren't worth the fee to me. Color and pattern choices are ok, but nothing really matched my style so I chose black. I'd probably get the personalized logo next time. Once again, I think this is a really cool idea. I definitely see room for improvement but I'm happy overall.
